sServerTab0: General Info

We have finetuned a server with lots of new weapons and ammo-types that have either replaced or supplemented base-game weapons on Chernarus. The server also has additional locations such as Krasnostav Airfield and Balota Oilrig, as well as being spiced up by a few additional air-vehicle crash-sites, air-dropped supply crates, as well as rideable horses (if you manage to tame one!).

The focus on our server is PvP and base building, with a few added activities such as Pokemon Card collecting and AI-paratroopers that will drop and hunt you (only if the server has low pop). Our server is also chat-enabled (global, groups, etc.), and has a map with markers for everyone to enjoy.
It's worth noting that we've tried to preserve the loot scarcity of the Official servers, while still offering a lot more variety in gear and weapons.
Hope you enjoy your stay!
Party/Group Info
You can manage your group by bringing up the Book (default keybind: B) when playing.
The maximum group size is set to 6.
Mod Info
You can find the current mods in use from the links on the bottom right side of this panel! The PasteBin link will take you to a page displaying the modlist.
1. General Rules
1.0 - To report any incidents or rulebreaches, please join our discord.gg/PWkv2GZRnu
1.1 - Insults, discrimination, extremist and racist statements or texts are forbidden and will lead to getting banned.
1.2 - We reserve the right to exclude people from the server who share extremist or racist ideas or who clearly disturb the server harmony.
1.3 - Decisions of the admins are to be accepted without discussion.
1.4 - Provocations and toxic behavior will not be tolerated and punished! Be friendly to fellow players and your team, both in chat and in voice!
1.5 - The use of external programs, scripts and cheats is not tolerated and is punished with a permanent exclusion.
2. Base building and raiding rules
2.0 - Territory flags needs to be raised every 7 days to stay active.
2.1 - Buildings and placed items in unclaimed territories will despawn after 30 days, regardless of interaction/use.
2.1.1 - You can still place traps, explosives, crates, fireplaces, and other small placeables outside of territories.
2.2 - Only base gates and doors can take damage, and only from Breaching Charges. Walls will not take damage, regular explosives will not work.
2.3 - You can have a maximum of 15 gates and doors in your base to keep it fair for everyone.
2.4 - Your base MUST be able to get raided. No raid-proof base designs are allowed.
2.5 - Death-tunnels in your base are not allowed, please keep it fair. Base raiding is a part of the game.
2.6 - There are a few areas around PoIs like military bases and larger camps that cannot be built in. You'll get an error if you try to place anything there.
2.6.1 - Building-restricted zones: NWAF, NEAF, Grozovy MB, Tri Kresta MB, Vybor MC, Tisy MB, Zelenogorsk MB, Staroye MB, Balota Oilrig.
sServerTab1: Getting started with your first base - Building Fortifications
To get your first hideout established you can use parts from the Building Fortifications mod to barricade a house. All you need is:

Once you have these things you'll need to gather some Sticks and combine them with your String to craft a Door Barricade Kit. The next step is to place your Door Barricade at a suitable location, like at a house entrance.
When your kit is placed, you'll need to gather two Wooden Logs from a nearby tree and attach these to your placed Door Barricade Kit, and finally use your Shovel to construct (dig) it.

Once your frame is in place, you'll need to get some wooden sticks from a nearby bush and attach them and some nails to the frame you built, and then use your hatchet (or hammer if you've got one) to construct the upper and lower frames.
Now you've completed the basics and should have a rudimentary grasp on how you can barricade a house. See the recipe list below for further building part options to strengthen your house barricades!
For more instructions, check out the mod author's tutorial video here: https://youtu.be/DzMxhy5de_U
Outer Upper First Planks (V): 1 Wooden Plank + 8 Nails
Outer Lower First Planks (V): 1 Wooden Plank + 8 Nails
Outer Final Upper Planks (H): 1 Wooden Plank + 8 Nails
Outer Final Lower Planks (H): 1 Wooden Plank + 8 Nails
Build Hinges (Gate) + Lock: 1 Metal Wire + 1 Pliers + 1 Lock
Build Side Post Holders: 1 Wooden Plank + 4 Nails
Build Center Post Holder: 1 Wooden Plank + 2 Nails
Craft Notch Plank (Lock): 1 Wooden Plank + 1 Any Saw
Double Door Base (Built): 4 Wooden Sticks + 1 Digging Tool
Left Final Outer Planks: 3 Wooden Planks + 12 Nails
Right Final Outer Planks: 3 Wooden Planks + 12 Nails
Add Upper Metal Plates: 2 Metal Plates + 8 Nails
Add Lower Metal Plates: 2 Metal Plates + 8 Nails
Build Stick Prop: 1 Long Stick + 2 Nails + 1 Pliers
Burlap Curtain Cloth: 1 Burlap Strips + 5 Sewing Kits
Attached Curtain Cloth: 1 Burlap Curtain + 1 Curtain Slot
sServerTab2: Advanced bases with the Base Building Plus mod

To get started with Base Building Plus (BBP), you'll need to first find a BBP Crafting Book. This book is found out in the open world, currently in Industrial and Village locations. Once you find this book, it will show you all the possible parts you can build.

Further on, you'll need to craft a Workbench where you can place your Crafting Book. To craft parts with the Workbench, simply attach the needed materials (like wooden planks and nails) to the Workbench and select the parts you want to build.

Once you've managed to craft the parts you want, you can place them in the world. Check your BBP Keybindings for the relevant operation keybinds you need when placing BBP parts - there are a few modes you're likely wanting to use (like snapping).

You can upgrade your initial wooden walls with Sheet Metal to reinforce them, and even after reinforcing them with metal you can further reinforce them with Concrete. To be able to upgrade with Concrete, you'll need to find a Concrete Mixer somewhere in the world to mix your Cement.
Metal Floor Mesh Frame: 25 Nails + 2 Sheet Metal
T2 Metal Floor Mesh: 25 Nails + 4 Sheet Metal
T3 Concrete Pillar: 1 Concrete Brick + 1 Mortar Mix
T3 Concrete Roof: 2 Concrete Bricks + 1 Mortar Mix
sServerTab3: Please check our Discord for thorough info & guides on other mods!
